RelatedSentence: Senator Tom Harkin ( D - IA ) today announced that the House and Senate conference committee on the Water Resources Reform and Development Act ( WRDA ) authorizes $ 88,120,300 for Iowa projects .
Senator Tom Harkin ( D - IA ) today announced that the House and Senate conference committee on the Water Resources Reform and Development Act ( WRDA ) authorizes $ 88,120,300 for Iowa projects .

A0: Senate conference committee on the Water Resources Reform and Development Act
RelatedSentence: The conference committee has reached agreement on a bill that will now go back to both chambers , where it is expected to pass this week .

Des Moines River and Raccoon River Project - the conference report authorizes $ 14,990,300 for a cost increase for a flood control project on the Des Moines and Raccoon Rivers to allow the project to proceed .
